tooltips.frontendUrl: User-facing URL of the Chat / Platform (e.g., https://chat.example.com). Used for SSO redirects and iframe embedding.
tooltips.backendUrl: API endpoint URL of the Chat / Platform (e.g., https://chat-api.example.com). Used for all API calls.
tooltips.accessToken: Platform API access token for Chat / Platform. Used to create and manage accounts.
